title: Trump says he wants three-way meeting with Putin and Zelensky after Alaska summit
subhead: The US president told reporters he'd had a 'very good call' with European leaders including Volodymyr Zelensky on Wednesday, and said he would like to have a second meeting after Friday's Alaska summit including the Ukrainian president.

title: Richard Avedon's photographs of the American West at Paris's Fondation Henri Cartier-Bresson
subhead: The remarkable series of images created in the 1980s, featuring Avedon's poignant portraits of workers, can now be seen for the first time in Europe.

title: 'Who shot JR?': The 'Dallas' episode that had the whole world on edge
subhead: 'Breaking The Script' (1/6). These legendary TV episodes shaped and transformed the genre. In 1980, at the end of the third season of 'Dallas,' the infamous JR Ewing was gunned down outside his office door. For eight long months, suspense over the shooter's identity kept viewers hooked. Spoiler alert!
